Player History
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/16/1986 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 8/18/1986 with a Fractured Hand, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 8/21/1989, off Jeff Montgomery (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/11/1989, off Roger Clemens (LAD)...
Won World Series with San Diego in 1991...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $750,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $750,000 through salary arbitration...
Traded from San Diego to Philadelphia on 8/1/1993 (Going to SD: 3B Matt D. Williams. Going to PHI: P Jeff Shaw, C Sandy Alomar, SS Bip Roberts)...
